name: exa1
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wi(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, w0), wex(s0, wi(w1, w0)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w1, w0))

comment: Add an antecedent in an existentially quantified formula. (Contributed by BJ, 6-Oct-2018.)
